import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { ExpenseTrackerContext } from "../../../context/context"; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from "uuid"; import { Row, Col, Select, InputNumber, DatePicker, Divider, Form, Button } from 'antd' import moment from 'moment' const { Option } = Select; const initialState = { type:'收入/支出', category:'種類', amount:'', // date:new Date() date:Intl.DateTimeFormat('zh-TW',{year:'numeric',month:'2-digit',day:'2-digit'}).format(new Date()).replace(/\//g,'-') } const FormOpt = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState) const {addTransaction} = useContext(ExpenseTrackerContext) const addItem = () =>{ const newItem = {...formData,id:uuidv4()} addTransaction(newItem) setFormData(initialState) } console.log(formData) return (
setFormData({...formData,amount:e})} /> setFormData({...formData, date:dateString.format('YYYY-MM-DD')})} />
) } export default FormOpt
